summary.span: Discovers the attributes of a method and provides access to method metadata.

span.span: Discovers the attributes of a method and provides access to method metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表類型的方法。The class represents a method of a type. 您可以使用物件取得該物件所代表之方法的相關資訊，並叫用方法。You can use a object to obtain information about the method that the object represents and to invoke the method. 例如: For example: - 您可以藉由擷取的值來判斷方法的可視性， ， ，和屬性。You can determine the method's visibility by retrieving the values of the , , , and properties. - 您可以探索哪些屬性會套用至方法所擷取的值屬性或呼叫方法。You can discover what attributes are applied to the method by retrieving the value of the property or calling the method. - 您可以判斷是否該方法是泛型方法、 開啟建構的泛型方法，或封閉式建構泛型方法，擷取的值和屬性。You can determine whether the method is a generic method, an open constructed generic method, or a closed constructed generic method, by retrieving the values of the and properties. - 您可以取得該方法之參數的相關資訊，並傳回類型從方法和， ，和屬性。You can get information about the method's parameters and return type from the method and the , , and properties. - 您可以針對類別執行個體執行方法，藉由呼叫方法。You can execute a method on a class instance by calling the method. - 您可以具現化物件，表示建構的泛型方法的其中一個代表泛型方法定義，藉由呼叫方法。You can instantiate a object that represents a constructed generic method from one that represents a generic method definition by calling the method. 您可以具現化藉由呼叫的執行個體或是方法，或藉由呼叫方法物件，代表泛型方法定義。You can instantiate a instances by calling the or method, or by calling the method of a object that represents a generic method definition. 如需泛型的方法特定的恆成立條件，請參閱屬性。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms specific to generic methods, see the property. 如需泛型反映中所使用的其他詞彙的非變異條件的清單，請參閱屬性。For a list of the invariant conditions for other terms used in generic reflection, see the property.

summary.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the object for the method on the direct or indirect base class in which the method represented by this instance was first declared.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the object for the method on the direct or indirect base class in which the method represented by this instance was first declared.

returns.span: A object for the first implementation of this method.

span.span: A object for the first implementation of this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回指定之方法的第一個定義類別階層架構中。The method returns the first definition of the specified method in the class hierarchy. 您可以判斷在其之方法的第一個定義尋找所擷取的值之型別的屬性傳回的物件。You can determine the type on which the first definition of the method is found by retrieving the value of the property on the returned object. 方法的行為，如下所示：The method behaves as follows: - 如果目前物件都代表介面實作，方法會傳回目前物件。If the current object represents an interface implementation, the method returns the current object. - 如果目前物件表示的方法，會覆寫虛擬基底類別，定義方法會傳回物件，表示虛擬的定義。If the current object represents a method that overrides a virtual definition in a base class, the method returns a object that represents the virtual definition. - 如果目前物件表示指定的方法`new`C# 關鍵字或`Shadows`關鍵字在 Visual Basic 中的 (依照`newslot`所述，在[一般型別系統](~/docs/standard/base-types/common-type-system.md))， 方法會傳回目前物件。If the current object represents a method that is specified with the `new` keyword in C# or the `Shadows` keyword in Visual Basic (as in `newslot`, as described in [Common Type System](~/docs/standard/base-types/common-type-system.md)), the method returns the current object. - 如果目前物件都代表繼承的方法 （也就是目前的方法不會提供它自己的實作），方法會傳回物件，表示在類別階層中最低的方法。If the current object represents an inherited method (that is, the current method does not provide its own implementation), the method returns a object that represents the lowest method in the class hierarchy. 比方說，如果`Base.ToString`會覆寫`Object.ToString`，並`Derived.ToString`覆寫`Base.ToString`，則呼叫方法物件，表示`Derived.ToString`傳回物件，表示`Object.ToString`.For example, if `Base.ToString` overrides `Object.ToString`, and `Derived.ToString` overrides `Base.ToString`, calling the method on a object that represents `Derived.ToString` returns a object that represents `Object.ToString`. - 如果目前物件表示的方法，不存在於任何基底類別方法會傳回目前物件。If the current object represents a method that is not present in any base class, the method returns the current object. 您可以判斷是否目前的方法覆寫基底類別中的方法呼叫方法。You can determine whether the current method overrides a method in a base class by calling the method. 下列範例會實作`IsOverride`作法的方法。The following example implements an `IsOverride` method that does this. [!code-csharp[system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition/cs/IsOverride1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition/vb/IsOverride1.vb#2)] 若要呼叫`GetBaseDefinition`方法：To call the `GetBaseDefinition` method: 1. 取得物件，表示包含屬性的型別 （類別或結構）。Get a object that represents the type (the class or structure) that contains the property. 如果您正在使用的物件 （類型的執行個體），您可以呼叫其方法。If you are working with an object (an instance of a type), you can call its method. 否則，您可以使用 C# 運算子，或 Visual Basic 運算子，與範例說明。Otherwise, you can use the C# operator or the Visual Basic operator, as the example illustrates. 2. 取得物件，表示您想要的方法。Get a object that represents the method in which you're interested. 您可以藉由取得所有的方法，從陣列方法，然後逐一查看的項目陣列，或者您可以擷取物件，表示直接藉由呼叫的方法方法並指定方法名稱。You can do this by getting an array of all methods from the method and then iterating the elements in the array, or you can retrieve the object that represents the method directly by calling the method and specifying the method name. 3. 呼叫方法來取得的值代表基底方法定義的物件。Call the method to get the value of the object that represents the base method definition. ## Examples 下列範例示範的行為方法。The following example demonstrates the behavior of the method. [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.MethodInfo.GetBaseDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition/cs/getbasedefinition1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.MethodInfo.GetBaseDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition/vb/getbasedefinition1.vb#1)]

summary.span: Returns an array of objects that represent the type arguments of a generic method or the type parameters of a generic method definition.

span.span: Returns an array of objects that represent the type arguments of a generic method or the type parameters of a generic method definition.

returns.span: An array of objects that represent the type arguments of a generic method or the type parameters of a generic method definition.

span.span: An array of objects that represent the type arguments of a generic method or the type parameters of a generic method definition.

returns.span: Returns an empty array if the current method is not a generic method.

span.span: Returns an empty array if the current method is not a generic method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回陣列中的項目會以其出現在清單中的泛型方法的型別參數的順序。The elements of the returned array are in the order in which they appear in the list of type parameters for the generic method. - 如果目前的方法是封閉式的建構的方法 (亦即屬性會傳回`false`)，所傳回的陣列方法包含已指派給泛型方法的泛型類型參數的型別定義。If the current method is a closed constructed method (that is, the property returns `false`), the array returned by the method contains the types that have been assigned to the generic type parameters of the generic method definition. - 如果目前的方法是泛型方法定義，陣列會包含型別參數。If the current method is a generic method definition, the array contains the type parameters. - 如果目前的方法是開啟的建構的方法 (亦即屬性會傳回`true`) 中某些型別參數和型別已指派特定類型的封入泛型類型參數已指派給其他類型參數，陣列會包含型別和型別參數。If the current method is an open constructed method (that is, the property returns `true`) in which specific types have been assigned to some type parameters and type parameters of enclosing generic types have been assigned to other type parameters, the array contains both types and type parameters. 使用辨別這兩者的屬性。Use the property to tell them apart. 如需示範此案例中，請參閱的程式碼範例屬性。For a demonstration of this scenario, see the code example for the property. 如需泛型的方法特定的恆成立條件，請參閱屬性。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms specific to generic methods, see the property. 如需泛型反映中所使用的其他詞彙的非變異條件的清單，請參閱屬性。For a list of the invariant conditions for other terms used in generic reflection, see the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得泛型方法的類型引數，並顯示它們。The following code example shows how to get the type arguments of a generic method and display them. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分方法。This example is part of a larger example provided for the method. [!code-cpp[MethodInfo.Generics#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/cpp/source.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[MethodInfo.Generics#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/CS/source.cs#8)] [!code-vb[MethodInfo.Generics#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/VB/source.vb#8)]

summary.span: Returns a object that represents a generic method definition from which the current method can be constructed.

span.span: Returns a object that represents a generic method definition from which the current method can be constructed.

returns.span: A object representing a generic method definition from which the current method can be constructed.

span.span: A object representing a generic method definition from which the current method can be constructed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 泛型方法定義是可從中建構方法的範本。A generic method definition is a template from which methods can be constructed. 例如，從泛型方法定義`T M(T t)`（以 C# 語法;`Function M(Of T)(ByVal tVal As T) As T`在 Visual Basic 中) 您可以建構，並叫用方法`int M(int t)`(`Function M(Of Integer)(ByVal tVal As Integer) As Integer` Visual Basic 中)。For example, from the generic method definition `T M(T t)` (expressed in C# syntax; `Function M(Of T)(ByVal tVal As T) As T` in Visual Basic) you can construct and invoke the method `int M(int t)` (`Function M(Of Integer)(ByVal tVal As Integer) As Integer` in Visual Basic). 給定表示這個物件之建構方法，方法會傳回泛型方法定義。Given a object representing this constructed method, the method returns the generic method definition. 如果兩個建構的方法從相同的泛型方法定義中，建立方法會傳回相同這兩種方法的物件。If two constructed methods are created from the same generic method definition, the method returns the same object for both methods. 如果您呼叫上已經代表泛型方法定義，它會傳回目前。If you call on a that already represents a generic method definition, it returns the current . 如果是泛型方法定義包含宣告型別的泛型參數，則會是泛型方法定義專屬於每個建構的類型。If a generic method definition includes generic parameters of the declaring type, there will be a generic method definition specific to each constructed type. 例如，請考慮下列 C#、 Visual Basic 和 c + + 程式碼：For example, consider the following C#, Visual Basic, and C++ code: ``` class B {} class C { public B M() {...}} Class B(Of U, V) End Class Class C(Of T) Public Function M(Of S)() As B(Of T, S) ... End Function End Class generic ref class B {}; generic ref class C { public: generic B^ M() {...}; }; ``` 在建構的型別`C`(`C(Of Integer)` Visual Basic 中)，泛型方法`M`傳回`B`。In the constructed type `C` (`C(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), the generic method `M` returns `B`. 在開啟的型別`C`，`M`傳回`B`。In the open type `C`, `M` returns `B`. 在這兩種情況下，屬性會傳回`true`for表示`M`，因此兩者都可呼叫物件。In both cases, the property returns `true` for the that represents `M`, so can be called on both objects. 在建構的型別，用來呼叫的情況下是，可以叫用。In the case of the constructed type, the result of calling is a that can be invoked. 在開啟的型別的情況下所傳回無法叫用。In the case of the open type, the returned by cannot be invoked. 如需泛型的方法特定的恆成立條件，請參閱屬性。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms specific to generic methods, see the property. 如需泛型反映中所使用的其他詞彙的非變異條件的清單，請參閱屬性。For a list of the invariant conditions for other terms used in generic reflection, see the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示具有泛型方法，並取得所需的程式碼的類別方法中，繫結的方法類型引數，然後從繫結的方法取得原始的泛型類型定義。The following code example shows a class with a generic method and the code required to obtain a for the method, bind the method to type arguments, and get the original generic type definition back from the bound method. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分方法。This example is part of a larger example provided for the method. [!code-cpp[MethodInfo.Generics#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodInfo.Generics#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodInfo.Generics#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodInfo.Generics#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/cpp/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[MethodInfo.Generics#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[MethodInfo.Generics#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/VB/source.vb#3)] [!code-cpp[MethodInfo.Generics#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MethodInfo.Generics#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MethodInfo.Generics#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/VB/source.vb#4)]

summary.span: Gets a value indicating that this member is a method.

span.span: Gets a value indicating that this member is a method.

value.span: 值，表示這個成員為方法。

span.span: A value indicating that this member is a method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會覆寫。This property overrides . 因此，當您檢查一組物件 — 比方說，所傳回的陣列—屬性會傳回只有當指定的成員是一種方法。Therefore, when you examine a set of objects — for example, the array returned by — the property returns only when a given member is a method. 若要取得`MemberType`屬性，第一次取得類別`Type`。To get the `MemberType` property, first get the class `Type`. 從`Type`，取得`MethodInfo`。From the `Type`, get the `MethodInfo`. 從`MethodInfo`，取得`MemberType`。From the `MethodInfo`, get the `MemberType`. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示指定成員的型別。The following example displays the type of the specified member. [!code-cpp[Classic MethodInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodInfo.MemberType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MethodInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodInfo.MemberType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MethodInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodInfo.MemberType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取得的傳回型別屬性，請先取得類別`Type`。To get the return type property, first get the class `Type`. 從`Type`，取得`MethodInfo`。From the `Type`, get the `MethodInfo`. 從`MethodInfo`，取得`ReturnType`。From the `MethodInfo`, get the `ReturnType`. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示指定之方法的傳回型別。The following example displays the return type of the specified method.
